text: Dana to kebala aksamadera jan'ya, ara abhabagrastadera, ara era jan'ya niyukta karmacaridera, ara yadera hrdaya jhomkono haya tadera, ara dasa-muktira, ara rnagrastadera, ara allahâ€Œra pathe, ara paryatakadera jan'ya, -- allahâ€Œra tarapha theke e'i bidhana. Ara allah sarbajnata, paramajnani.
